bcl:section.bcl:text: In this Act, fireworks includes cannon crackers, fireballs, firecrackers, mines, Roman candles, skyrockets, squibs, torpedoes and any other explosive designated as a firework by regulation.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Selling, giving or setting off fireworks
bcl:section.bcl:text: Except between October 24 and November 1 in any year, a person must not sell, give, fire or set off fireworks.
The fire commissioner may designate fireworks that may not be sold to a minor without the written permission of the parent or guardian of the minor.
Fireworks may be sold to and discharged by a person or organization at a public display if the public display is held with the written permission of

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a local assistant of the fire commissioner who has jurisdiction in the fire district where the public display is held.
